entities.name: the pensieve
entities.description: A device used by Dumbledore to store and view his thoughts and memories. ("This? It is called a Pensieve...")

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts who is standing beside Harry. ("Albus Dumbledore was standing beside him.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who is talking to Dumbledore. ("Harry gasped..." "Harry did so...")

relationships.description: Dumbledore has a Pensieve, which he uses to store his thoughts and memories. ("This? It is called a Pensieve...")
Harry is talking to Dumbledore about the Pensieve. ("Professor," Harry gasped, "I know I shouldn’t’ve — I didn’t mean...")
Dumbledore is talking to Harry about the Pensieve. ("I quite understand," said Dumbledore.)
